Name: Robot Exploration Squad
About the game: When a massive and mysterious space station suddenly shows up, the Robot Exploration Squad is sent in to investigate. You play as the first scientist to throw on a robo suit and board the station. A 2D Metroidvania game with equal focus on action and exploration. The game features a massive open world, plenty of upgrades, diverse enemies, and huge bosses. Are you a bad enough robot to make it out in one piece?
